reviewText: A very good account of the German Resistance movement and the various attempts by the hundreds of German officers and citizens who were involved in plans to assassinate Hitler during WWII.I've watched many documentaries and movies about WWII and the failed attempts to assassinate Hitler. This highly informative, fascinating documentary pays tribute to those who risked (and lost) their lives attempting to rid the world of one of the most pyschopathic, genocidal killers in modern history. (NOTE: I'd love to see something similar done about one of the world's other ruthless, mass murderers -- Josef Stalin).This documentary includes comments from several family members of those Resistance members who were killed by the Nazis.  Other enlightening comments are from noted historians of WWII and the Nazi reign.While some may fault aspects of this documentary, I recommend it to those, such as I, who knew little to nothing about the German Resistance and, in particular, the 20 July Valkyrie plot.
summary: For Those Interested in Learning More about the German Resistance
Title: Operation Valkyrie: The Stauffenberg Plot to Kill Hitler

reviewText: THREE HOURS WELL WORTH VIEWING FOR GERMAN HISTORY BUFFS.A rare but scholarly documentary fascinates. Particularly segments on the Berghof, Adolf Hitler's 1927-1945 Obersalzberg home showing several fairly "normal" looking women with nice personalities. Oblivious of the war crimes happening far away, the men often smile at one another and at the women.An excellent documentary, with few flaws worth mentioning. The two hours of bonus features were quite exceptional and very informative, particularly  interview with  Philipp Freiherr von Boeselager, the second-to-last surviving member of the 20 July 1944 conspiracy. Boeselager died shortly after the this DVD interview on 1 May 2008. The "last man standing" Ewald-Heinrich von Kleist-Schmenzin died on Friday 8 March 2013.  Both deserve honoring.Without being sentimental about it, in my opinion, the Germans remain better democrats than their teachers in telling the truth about history. When can we expect to have kids in USA schools learn the truth about The American War?The Gedenkstätte Deutscher Widerstand (Stauffenberg memorial and museum) is only a few meters from public transportation and close to one of Germany's best run Youth Hostels.I've been there twice and plan on returning again this summer. This documentary is true to history and will survive fact checking. Both film proper and the extras show a good attention to accurate detail.  Note that most, if not all, conspirators came from a religious tradition but formal effective opposition to Hitler from key Lutheran and Roman Catholic leaders remained underwhelming. Thus It's more than appropriate to honor "Christians" of moral fiber such as those depicted. Contrast them with George Bush!Remember that from 1933 until today of the millions of Wehrmacht soldiers "serving" in the east ( many involved in horrible genocides ) NO Catholic soldiers were ever excommunicated. ZERO. ZILCH. It's too late now (without new doctrine) but it would have symbolic value if Roman Catholic Adolf Hitler had been excommunicated. At times his speechs were filled with religious fervor. Faith-based immoral actions are not new.He loved invoking "Providence" as he claimed to be doing the work of god. Nazi soldiers "serving" under Hitler all wore "Gott mit Uns" as belt buckles.To be fair and balanced, history will not look kindly upon Pope Pius XIII.Cardinal Pacelli (later Pope Pius XII) gave Hitler early support in April 1933 with his signing the Concordat. (One of the earliest treaties under Hitler)It was an unholy marriage of convenience between Hitler and Vatican.I agree with reviewers saying "great for history buffs."  Yes, indeed.2013.03.17 OPERATION VALKYRIEHitler's Pope: The Secret History of Pius XIIThe Most Dangerous Man in America: Daniel Ellsberg and the Pentagon PapersHitler, Mussolini and the Vatican: Pope Pius XI and the Speech That was Never MadeHitler's Pope: The Secret History of Pius XIIThe Most Dangerous Man in America: Daniel Ellsberg and the Pentagon PapersSecrets: A Memoir of Vietnam and the Pentagon PapersKill Anything That Moves: The Real American War in VietnamA People's History of the United States: 1492 to PresentA People's History of the United States (P.S.)Howard Zinn Speaks: Collected Speeches 1963 to 2009Manufacturing Consent: Noam Chomsky and the MediaManufacturing Consent: Noam Chomsky and the Media
Title: Operation Valkyrie: The Stauffenberg Plot to Kill Hitler

reviewText: Koch Vision present "OPERATION VALKYRIE: THE STAUFFENBERG PLOT TO KILL HITLER" (2008) (76 mins/Color) (Dolby Digital) ---  tells the amazing true story of German resistance fighter Claus von Stauffenberg and his plot to assassinate Adolf Hitler --- Using eyewitness accounts, remarkable archival footage, and very detailed dramatizations, this powerful documentary transports viewers back to the tumultuous depths of World War II, and chronicles one man's courageous attempt to change the course of history.Operation Valkyrie (Unternehmen Walküre) was an operational plan developed for the Resistance Army of the German Army (Wehrmacht Heer). The plan was approved by German dictator Adolf Hitler, who intended it to be used in the event that disruption caused by the Allied bombing of German cities resulted in a breakdown in law and order, or a rising by the millions of forced laborers from occupied countries working in German factories.SPECIAL FEATURES:Additional Footage:1. Newly Re-mastered Home Movies Shot by Eva Braun2. Footage from the Volksgericht TrialsInterviewsFEATURETTES:1. "A Visit to the Stauffenberg Estate"2. "An Examination of Other Assassination Attempts on Hitler"3. "A Visit to the German Resistance Memorial Center"Text/Photo Galleries:Still PhotosGreat job by Koch Vision and their staff, the digital transfers with a clean, clear and crisp print --- looking forward to more high quality releases from them--- if you enjoyed this title, why not check out Koch Vision where they are experts in releasing long forgotten films and treasures to the collector.Total Time: 76 mins on DVD ~ Koch Vision ~ (11/11/2008)
summary: "The Stauffenberg Plot to Kill Hitler ... Operation Valkyrie ... Koch Vision (2008)"
Title: Operation Valkyrie: The Stauffenberg Plot to Kill Hitler

reviewText: This is the real story behind it,How A Roman Catholic like Stauffenberg was one of the originators to get rid of a murderous tyrant(same as Lenin,Stalin,Mao,Castro/Che,Pol Pot Ho Chi Minh).Although it should have given credit to Pius as he did all that he could a lot more than most protestants(read lutheran) did.

reviewText: I bought this because I saw the documentary on Public Television.  It is incredibly well done, showing the background and history of the Stauffenberg plot to kill Hitler.  The two hours of bonus features are of great interest and add greatly to this DVD.  It would be an important addition to the DVD library of anyone who is interested in the many plots to eliminate Hitler and free Germany and the world of his consumate madness and the evil which he personified and perpetrated.  It is of supreme inportance that the world NEVER, EVER FORGET WHAT HITLER STOOD FOR AND DID TO INNOCENT PEOPLE.
summary: A must for World War II buffs!
Title: Operation Valkyrie: The Stauffenberg Plot to Kill Hitler

reviewText: Operation Valkyrie: The Stauffenberg Plot to Kill Hitler is an inside view of the story with real eyewitness accounts.  The film offers an excellent scholarly approach with rare footage, exclusive interviews, and much more. Plus, the two hours of bonus features are not available anywhere else!
summary: Operation Valkyrie: The Stauffenberg Plot to Kill Hitler
Title: Operation Valkyrie: The Stauffenberg Plot to Kill Hitler

reviewText: If you like the Tom Cruse movie, you will like this documentary. Stauffenberg was a true hero, doing what he did or try to do in the face of all this evil. It is a great thing these people have been shown to the public & made them aware of their efforts to end the horrors displayed by Hitler & his minions. Highly recomend this DVD.
Title: Operation Valkyrie: The Stauffenberg Plot to Kill Hitler
